mapper.select:
SELECT sum(aa.count) from ( SELECT count(*) AS count FROM ope_allocate allocate JOIN ope_sys_user_profile pro ON allocate.consignee_id = pro.id and pro.dr = 0
UNION SELECT count(*) AS count FROM ope_assembly_order ord JOIN ope_sys_user_profile pro ON ord.consignee_id = pro.id and pro.dr = 0 )aa

SELECT sum(aa.count) from ( SELECT count(*) AS count FROM ope_allocate allocate JOIN ope_sys_user_profile pro ON allocate.consignee_id = pro.id and pro.dr = 0
UNION SELECT count(*) AS count FROM ope_assembly_order ord JOIN ope_sys_user_profile pro ON ord.consignee_id = pro.id and pro.dr = 0 )aa

SELECT allocate.id as id, allocate.allocate_num as allocateNumber, allocate.STATUS as `status`, pro.id as consigneeId, pro.first_name as consigneeFristName, pro.last_name as consigneelastName, pro.email as email, pro.tel_number as phone, pro.country_code as telCountryCode, '2' as classType FROM ope_allocate allocate JOIN ope_sys_user_profile pro ON allocate.consignee_id = pro.id and pro.dr = 0 WHERE allocate.id =#{enter.id} and allocate.dr = 0

SELECT ord.id as id, ord.assembly_number as allocateNumber, ord.STATUS as `status`, pro.id as consigneeId, pro.first_name as consigneeFristName, pro.last_name as consigneelastName, pro.email as email, pro.tel_number as phone, pro.country_code as telCountryCode, '2' as classType FROM ope_assembly_order ord JOIN ope_sys_user_profile pro ON ord.consignee_id = pro.id and pro.dr = 0 WHERE ord.id = #{enter.id} and ord.dr = 0

SELECT allocate.id as id, parts.cn_name AS cnName, parts.en_name AS enName, parts.parts_number AS productNumber, parts.parts_type AS productType, allocate.total-allocate.pending_storage_qty AS qty, allocate.total AS sumTotal, '1' as classType FROM ope_allocate_b allocate JOIN ope_parts parts ON allocate.part_id = parts.id and parts.dr = 0 WHERE allocate.allocate_id = #{enter.id} and allocate.dr = 0 GROUP BY id, cnName, enName

SELECT ord.id as id, product.cn_name AS cnName, product.en_name AS enName, product.product_number AS productNumber, product.product_type AS productType, ord.assembly_qty-ord.wait_assembly_qty AS qty, ord.assembly_qty AS sumTotal, '1' as classType FROM ope_assembly_b_order ord JOIN ope_parts_product product ON ord.product_id = product.id and product.dr = 0 WHERE ord.assembly_id = #{enter.id} and ord.dr = 0 GROUP BY id, cnName, enName

SELECT sum( aa.count ) FROM ( SELECT count(*) AS count FROM ope_allocate allocate JOIN ope_sys_user_profile pro ON allocate.consignee_id = pro.id AND pro.dr = 0 WHERE allocate.dr = 0 AND allocate.`status` = #{inWhStatus} UNION SELECT count(*) AS count FROM ope_assembly_order ord JOIN ope_sys_user_profile pro ON ord.consignee_id = pro.id AND pro.dr = 0 WHERE ord.dr = 0 AND ord.`status` = #{assemblingStatus} ) aa

SELECT sum( aa.count ) FROM ( SELECT count(*) AS count FROM ope_allocate allocate JOIN ope_sys_user_profile pro ON allocate.consignee_id = pro.id and pro.dr = 0 WHERE allocate.dr = 0 AND allocate.`status` = #{inWhStatus} UNION SELECT count(*) AS count FROM ope_assembly_order ord JOIN ope_sys_user_profile pro ON ord.consignee_id = pro.id and pro.dr = 0 WHERE ord.dr = 0 AND ord.`status` = #{assemblingStatus} ) aa
SELECT count(*) FROM ope_stock stock JOIN ope_parts parts ON stock.materiel_product_id = parts.id and parts.dr = 0 JOIN ope_price_sheet sheet ON parts.id = sheet.parts_id and sheet.dr = 0

SELECT stock.id as id, parts.cn_name as cnName, parts.en_name as enName, parts.parts_number as productNumber, stock.wait_product_total as intTotal, stock.materiel_product_type as productType, sheet.price as price FROM ope_stock stock JOIN ope_parts parts ON stock.materiel_product_id = parts.id and parts.dr = 0 JOIN ope_price_sheet sheet ON parts.id = sheet.parts_id and sheet.dr = 0
limit #{enter.startRow},#{enter.pageSize}

select sum(outWh.total) from( select count(*) as total from ope_fr_stock stock inner JOIN ope_parts_product part ON stock.materiel_product_id = part.id and part.dr = 0 and stock.materiel_product_type = 4 LEFT JOIN ope_regional_price_sheet sheet ON sheet.parts_product_id = part.id and sheet.dr = 0 and sheet.currency_unit = #{amountType} UNION select count(*) as total from ope_fr_stock stock inner JOIN ope_parts part ON stock.materiel_product_id = part.id and part.dr = 0 and stock.materiel_product_type != 4 LEFT JOIN ope_price_sheet sheet on sheet.parts_id = part.id and sheet.dr = 0 )outWh
